epic.title: Assessments & Examinations Module
epic.body: Provides a unified system for managing offline and online assessments, exam scheduling, grading, result publication, analytics, and report cards across multi-organization and multi-branch institutions.

features.title: Assessment & Exam Configuration
features.body: Configure different types of assessments such as term exams, unit tests, assignments, and online tests with flexible rules per organization.

stories.title: Create and manage assessment types (backend)
stories.body: Persist assessment types and rules scoped to organization and academic year.
acceptanceCriteria: Assessment types are scoped to organization and academic year
Supports exam categories: term, unit, assignment, online
Each type supports max marks, passing marks, and weightage
Deactivating a type does not affect historical results

stories.title: Configure assessment types (frontend)
stories.body: Allow admins to define and manage assessment types via UI.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin can create, edit, and deactivate assessment types
Form validation prevents invalid marks or weightage
Only authorized roles can access configuration screens

features.title: Exam Scheduling & Calendar
features.body: Schedule exams and assessments with subject-wise timelines and visibility via academic calendars.

stories.title: Schedule exams (backend)
stories.body: Store and validate exam schedules mapped to class, subject, and assessment type.
acceptanceCriteria: Exams are linked to class, section, subject, and assessment type
Prevents overlapping exams for the same class and time
Supports offline and online exam modes

stories.title: Manage exam calendar (frontend)
stories.body: Display exams in calendar and list views for admins, teachers, students, and parents.
acceptanceCriteria: Calendar shows exams by date and class
Students and parents have read-only access
Teachers see exams only for assigned subjects

features.title: Marks Entry & Evaluation
features.body: Enable teachers to enter and manage marks through bulk upload and manual entry with validation.

stories.title: Store and validate marks (backend)
stories.body: Persist student marks with validation and auditability.
acceptanceCriteria: Marks cannot exceed maximum configured marks
Supports bulk upload via API
Tracks who entered or modified marks and when

stories.title: Enter marks manually and in bulk (frontend)
stories.body: Provide UI for manual and bulk marks entry by teachers.
acceptanceCriteria: Teachers can enter marks per subject and exam
Bulk upload errors are clearly highlighted
Draft marks can be saved before final submission

features.title: Custom Grading System
features.body: Support organization-specific grading systems such as marks-based, grade-based, or hybrid models.

stories.title: Configure grading schemes (backend)
stories.body: Persist grading rules and grade mappings per organization.
acceptanceCriteria: Supports grade ranges (e.g., A+, A, B)
Grading schemes are versioned per academic year
Changing scheme does not alter past results

stories.title: Manage grading schemes (frontend)
stories.body: Allow admins to define grading systems via UI.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin can preview grade mappings
Validation prevents overlapping grade ranges
Only one active grading scheme per academic year

features.title: Online MCQ-Based Examinations
features.body: Conduct online MCQ exams with automatic evaluation and result calculation.

stories.title: Online exam execution and auto-evaluation (backend)
stories.body: Deliver MCQ exams, capture responses, and auto-evaluate results.
acceptanceCriteria: Supports timed exams with auto-submit
Auto-evaluates MCQs immediately after submission
Soft-limits concurrent users if infra threshold is reached

stories.title: Attempt online exams (frontend)
stories.body: Allow students to take MCQ exams with stable UX.
acceptanceCriteria: Shows remaining time clearly
Prevents navigating away without warning
Auto-submits on timeout or network failure

features.title: Results Publishing & Access
features.body: Publish results and allow controlled access for students and parents.

stories.title: Publish and lock results (backend)
stories.body: Control result visibility and immutability after publication.
acceptanceCriteria: Results are invisible until explicitly published
Published results cannot be edited without admin override
Access is role-based (student, parent, teacher)

stories.title: View results (frontend)
stories.body: Display exam results to students and parents.
acceptanceCriteria: Students see only their own results
Parents see results of linked children
Grades and marks are clearly explained

features.title: Automated Report Card Generation
features.body: Generate downloadable report cards based on configured grading and assessments.

stories.title: Generate report cards (backend)
stories.body: Generate PDF report cards per student.
acceptanceCriteria: PDF is generated within 3 seconds per student
Includes grades, marks, and overall performance
Supports regeneration without data duplication

stories.title: Download report cards (frontend)
stories.body: Allow authorized users to download report cards.
acceptanceCriteria: Admins can bulk download report cards
Students and parents can download individual PDFs
UI shows generation progress clearly

features.title: Performance Analytics & Comparisons
features.body: Provide insights into student, class, and subject performance.

stories.title: Compute performance analytics (backend)
stories.body: Aggregate and compute performance metrics.
acceptanceCriteria: Supports student-wise and class-wise comparisons
Analytics queries are optimized for large datasets
Historical data remains immutable

stories.title: View analytics dashboards (frontend)
stories.body: Display charts and summaries for authorized users.
acceptanceCriteria: Teachers see subject-level analytics
Admins see institution-level comparisons
Charts load within acceptable response times

features.title: Non-Functional Requirements
features.body: Ensure performance, scalability, and reliability of the assessments module.

stories.title: Assessments performance and scalability
stories.body: Meet non-functional market requirements for assessments.
acceptanceCriteria: Supports up to 5,000 concurrent online test takers
Bulk marks entry APIs are optimized for large uploads
System degrades gracefully under peak load

features.title: Online Exam Definition & Question Bank
features.body: Define question banks, questions, and online exam configurations used to deliver MCQ-based online assessments.

stories.title: Manage question banks (backend)
stories.body: Persist and manage question banks scoped to organization, subject, and academic year.
acceptanceCriteria: Question banks are scoped to organization and academic year
Each question bank is linked to a subject
Inactive question banks cannot be used in new exams
Existing exams remain unaffected if a question bank is modified

stories.title: Create and manage question banks (frontend)
stories.body: Allow teachers and admins to create and organize question banks.
acceptanceCriteria: Teachers can create and edit question banks for assigned subjects
Admins can view and manage all question banks
UI clearly shows active vs inactive question banks

stories.title: Create and manage questions (backend)
stories.body: Persist questions and answers with validation and versioning.
acceptanceCriteria: Supports MCQ questions with 2â€“5 options
Each question has one correct answer
Questions support difficulty level (easy, medium, hard)
Editing a question does not affect published exams

stories.title: Author questions and answers (frontend)
stories.body: Provide UI for teachers to author MCQ questions.
acceptanceCriteria: Teachers can add, edit, and delete questions
Correct answer must be explicitly selected
Form validation prevents incomplete questions
Questions can be previewed before saving

stories.title: Define online exams (backend)
stories.body: Persist online exam configurations using selected question banks.
acceptanceCriteria: Online exams are linked to assessment type and subject
Supports fixed or random question selection
Exam configuration includes duration and total marks
Once published, exam definition becomes immutable

stories.title: Configure online exams (frontend)
stories.body: Allow admins or teachers to configure online exams via UI.
acceptanceCriteria: User can select question banks and number of questions
UI shows computed total marks before publishing
Exam can be saved as draft before publishing
Only authorized roles can publish exams

stories.title: Online exam integrity and safety
stories.body: Ensure integrity and basic security for online exams.
acceptanceCriteria: Each student receives a unique question order
Exam access is restricted to scheduled time window
Students cannot reattempt once submitted
Basic anti-refresh and session validation is enforced
